column4: hi, i've just upgraded to 9.04 but i have no sound ; i've tried a speaker-test and there is no error : http://paste.ubuntu.com/157250/
also if i launch a mp3 with vlc x.mp3 i have no error and the mp3 plays but there is still no sound
did you check your sound preferences?
i checked with the logo on the bottom right of the screen and with the command 'alsamixer'
IHS_intern: i unmuted every channel but i still have no sound
